channel.title: Some Problems on my server ( lunarscape ) read please
channel.description:
>>> Problems <<<
- How to fix range so it shots from long range. - Make barrage multi. - Fixing amount of players on server. - How to add 1 pickup so when item on floor you only click once. - Adding a menu. - Npc's use mage like ( Battlemages and Ahrims ). - Changeing maxh it with items like whip and dds. - Adding Quest or minigame ( links would be nice ). - Adding Spec and fix 2 gs like sgs and ags - Adding stance to godsword like on rs ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> Client <<<
- Adding spec like rs so shows on client - Makeing own items and npcs - Changeing npc looks - Adding more Clicks on client like rs ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> Website <<<
- Makeing a web like rs ( links be nice ) - Website - [url=http://www.lunarscape.co.nr]www.lunarscape.co.nr[/url] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
